channel.title: Got a heavy dose of karma tonight
channel.description: Was binge playing ToL as I do almost every day and today I had an interesting game as prince. Jailed a guy who claimed CW and gave me his logs which showed who all he BARRIERED. I laughed on the inside as I slaughtered him. He ended up being MM. the next day came and I told everybody what happened and we all "loled" at the MM who didn't do his homework on the patch. The next night I jailed somebody who's logs said they debbached ME twice succesfully. Well I'm prince so that couldn't be right, I'm immune to being debbached, those logs didn't add up. So I executed him. And then I saw, karma had instantly smacked me in the face.

item.title: Got a heavy dose of karma tonight
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Karma’s a bitch ain’t it

Read full topic

item.title: Got a heavy dose of karma tonight
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Was binge playing ToL as I do almost every day and today I had an interesting game as prince. Jailed a guy who claimed CW and gave me his logs which showed who all he BARRIERED. I laughed on the inside as I slaughtered him. He ended up being MM. the next day came and I told everybody what happened and we all “loled” at the MM who didn’t do his homework on the patch. The next night I jailed somebody who’s logs said they debbached ME twice succesfully. Well I’m prince so that couldn’t be right, I’m immune to being debbached, those logs didn’t add up. So I executed him. And then I saw, karma had instantly smacked me in the face.

Read full topic
